doc.str: Disclosed is a system for treating wastewater. The system includes a microorganism clad structure positioned in a body of wastewater such that the microorganism clad structure is at least partially submerged in the body of wastewater. The apparatus also includes an aeration device, such as a propeller-type, surface mounted aeration device, supplying a horizontal flow of oxygenated water to the microorganisms attached to the microorganism clad structure such that the microorganisms may carry out a biological process.

Korkut et al., "Wastewater Treatment with Biomass Attached to Porous Geotextile Baffles", Journal of Environemtnal Engineering, Feb. 2006, pp. 284-288. cited by other . | Ripple, "Nitrification of a Lagoon Effluent Using Fixed Film Media: Pilot Study Results", Newea Annual Conference, Jan. 2002,10 pgs. cited by other . | LagoonGuard for industrial and municipal wastewater treatment:, AnoxKaldnes AS Fact Sheet, 2 pgs., prior to Sep. 5, 2006. cited by other . | MBBR Biofilm Technology, "An Introduction to biofilm wastewater treatment", AnoxKaldnes AS Fact Sheet, 4 pgs, prior to Sep. 5, 2006. cited by other . | "AIRE -O2 Surface Aspirating Aerator, Pioneers in Wastewater Technology", Aeration Industries International, Inc. brochure, 8 pgs., no date. cited by other . | "Nitrogen reduction in Advanced Wastewater Treatment Processes", AnoxKaldnes AS Fact Sheet, 2 pgs, prior to Sep. 5, 2006. cited by other . | "Klippan Waste Water Treatment Plant", Article, 1 pg., Nov. 10, 2005. cited by other . | Infiniti System Article, AutoGenomics, 1 pg., Nov. 10, 2005. cited by other. | "Retrofitting Into The Hybas Process" Article, 1 pg., Nov. 10, 2005. cited by other . | "Better Technologies. Better Water. Because life depends on clean water.", Aeration Industries International Inc. brochure, 29 pgs., no date. cited by other .
